segments.text: Mom , I want to move out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , sounds great to me , kid . What kind of job did you find ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , job . If you ’ re going to live on your own , you have to pay for rent and everything else .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought I could just get you and Dad to pay for an apartment . I found a cheap one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you move out , your father and I aren ’ t paying your rent , young man . Get a job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re right . If I ’ m going to live on my own , I have to be independent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the newspaper is over there . Look in the want ads , but I don ’ t know what you ’ re going to find without a college degree .
segments.speaker: S2
